sub_title: Senior Designer at AGU & AGU Teamwear B.V.
summary:
Hi I am a Amsterdam area based design manager with a huge commercial track-record...MAD about cycling, passionate about genuine art, design & tastefulness in general.

Always seeking opportunities and challenges within the design, handcraft and visual spectrum with a strong sense for the commercial value of the end product.

Beyond up-to-date creative and art direction capacity and a perfect feeling for the balance between commercial and creative success.
Worked for worldwide active brands: O'Neill, Levis, Puma, Tommy Hilfiger, Brunotti, Head, The Walt Disney company, Cartoon Network, Jack Daniels, Pokemon, Sony, Nintendo, Ubisoft, Agu, Sissy-boy, Blue Barn jeans, Dita, Rembrandt corporate services etc.

I have a entrepreneurial approach in giving directions and day-to-day team guiding.
Multi task experienced, running a team of 17 designers, determine a annual budget strategy, hiring new talents from A to Z so from talent accusition to guiding within te team/company and annual appraisal and performance reviews.
Excellent team-builder amongst other things.

A team player and leader who wants to understand the structured goal and path of a company and work in a team towards that vision.

Current Senior graphic designer at Agu #everydayriding
  
Latest design projects for Vinada, Blue Barn jeans, Dita, Sissy-boy, Rembrandt, Cookie company, RFTC 
Design manager at Difuzed 2015 - 2017
Design projects for Agu 2015 - 2018
Creative Consulting & Design Girav longfit, Dita (field hockey, hardware) & Jack Fischer 2014 - 2015
Creative Coördinator & Senior Graphic Designer at Dobotex Ltd. - PUMA AG Group 2014 
Graphic Designer at Brunotti Europe b.v. 2014
Founder, Owner Castle of Dreams holding bv 2013 - Present
Graphic Designer at O'Neill European HQ 1988 - 2013
Founder, Owner Jaybird Nation v.o.f. 2007 - 2011
Founder, Owner, Art Direction, Graphic Design Wandervogel clothing 2007 - 2011
Guest lecture's / teacher MA (Media college Amsterdam) 2000 - 2012

projects.title: The Disney company EMEA lifestyle event London design project
projects.description:
For over 70 years, Disney's storytelling has influenced populair culture and been brought to life trough innovative fashion and lifestyle products. Walt Disney himself was known for his forward thinking philosophy on design, technology and innovation. Today, the Disney company. continue to place great importance in ensuring his philosophy is maintained in every design and product we create.
The EMEA lifestyle event that was held spring 2016 at London's iconic venue Somerset House showcased he best of Disney's adult targeted fashion and lifestyle collaborations and conceptual designs.

As design team manager for Bioworld Europe we managed in a extrem short timeframe to make a collection of fantastic products that amazed the audience in originality and trend right products.

Thanks to the Disney team in London and Brussels and the Bioworld Europe design team.

projects.title: Branding and Logo guidelines
projects.description:
To effectively set the rules of branding and logo usage on multiple products and multiple cross media designs.

This all must lead to a clear branding and direct recognizable for end consumers to create the best brand awareness.

For worldwide operating brands like O'Neill and Puma

contributors.headline: Senior Designer at AGU & AGU Teamwear B.V.

profile_positions.description:
AGU Teamwear the specialist in the best kit possible for cycling, speed skating, etc.
From the professional teams like GCN "global cycling netword" the KNWU and the pro-riders and crew of Team Jumbo Visma to the local weekend warriors breaking distance and speed records, to ice skating and cycling teams all around the world, we got you covered with the best product lines available on the market. Rider tested rider proven...the fastest time trial suits and all the other garments in collaboration with Jutta, Tom, Primoz, Steven, Jonas, Sepp, Marianne, Wout and all other heroes of Team Jumbo Visma. And AGU the brand keeps you covered since 1966, developing top level cycling gear like the SIX6 coll, Venture Coll and heavy commuter gear like bike-packing equipment and raincoats an more #EVERYDAYRIDING we got you covered.
profile_positions.title: Senior Designer at AGU & AGU Teamwear B.V.

profile_positions.description:
What do I bring to the table?

http://cargocollective.com/RVM and see for yourself...

- 33+ years experience in textile and graphic design
- Experience in working for international brands
- Up to date with the latest trends and movements in the (end) customers market
- Perfect team builder (hired over 17+ FTE's)
- Experienced in leading a team of talented designers
- Experienced in a appraisal talk structure
- Experienced in making a annual budget plan of about well a lot of...Euro’s and sticking with that plan
- Some brands currently in my portfolio are Dita field hockey, Blue barn jeans, YAHMAN!,  Mistral, Timemachine kids festival, Devon Harris.
profile_positions.title: CREATIVE CHAMELEON - Hands on - Creative thinker - that’s me - Creative team lead - double me

profile_positions.description:
Kabinet of Curiosity
Pure love, Pure products

A webshop with pure products for kids, in the category play- and sleepwear, toys, interior and art.
Everything with our organic, local, handcraft en recycled  philosophy in mind.

There are different ways to see pure products;

- Certified purest; certified the most purest products in the market. Gots, oekotex, fsc wood certifications, non toxic paint etc.

- Recycled; products made from raw materials which are re-used, recycled plastics like old/used milkcontainers, etc

- Local heroes; products designed and made by local heroes, produced in Europa or preferably even closer. We try to support the local markets and economies here and limit our carbon footprint.

- Handcraft; products which are handmade, just to honor honesty and creativity.

Beautiful kids products good for our little ones but also less harmful for our surroundings and nature.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibility:

- Management team member

- Coordinate the design team in a inspiring way and facilitate a creative environment so the team can translate all brands concepts and license identity's onto products & collections.

- Organization and effectively guide the design department to ensure there is alignment between all functions and products that are created.

- Responsible for the departments budget (incl salaries) with a annual report to the board, responsible for a work-flow track record system with a fundamental and creative KPI approach.

- Constantly improving systems and processes to optimize work-flow and get maximum creative output.

- Highly appropriate and will work hard for a real team feeling were each member has a important role, with a genuine belief that with a great them you can create a rainbow of diverse products that will guarantee a satisfying turn-over. 

BIOWORLD EUROPE STORY

Lifestyle meets merchandise: Apparel & accessories, design & creations.
 
BIOWORLD EUROPE is a leading global business which develops lifestyle products for a wide range of entertainment, fashion, sports and consumer goods brands across apparel & fashion accessories.

We are proud to work with more than 100 of the world’s best known and most prestigious brands. (check our site for brands we carry) BIOWORLD EUROPE fulfills the part of designer, producer and distributor of licensed lifestyle products to stores worldwide.

Curious ? please check:

http://www.bioworldeurope.com
https://www.facebook.com/BioworldEurope
profile_positions.title: Design Manager

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibility

-To effectively coordinate the design team and to translate all brand seasonal concepts and identity   onto product collections.

- Organization and effective work-flow of creative / design and graphic department to ensure there
is a clear alignment between all functions.

- Final collection reviews for all brands and categories to ensure the commercial needs as well as innovations on all levels.

- Deliver tech-pack improvements with a new (to be integrated) PLM system in mind. 

- Set-up a Puma logo guideline for all categories that also will be used for licensee purposes across the world.

- Design special presentation projects for board members (C.E.O. and C.F.O.)


Dobotex International has the worldwide licence rights of PUMA Socks and Bodywear and is owned by PUMA. 
The collections comprise a never-out-of-stock program, in combination with a fashion collection that is updated every quarter. The distinctive collections that were developed in collaboration with PUMA A.G, include both technical sports socks and very stylish lifestyle socks.

Dobotex also has the exclusive license rights of leg wear of the brand Tommy Hilfiger in Europe. This makes Dobotex responsible for the development, production, sale and distribution of all Tommy Hilfiger socks. The stylish Tommy Hilfiger leg wear collections consists of fashionable lifestyle socks for men, women and children.

Also owned by Dobotex are the brands and licensee rights for Levi's leg and bodywear Levi's Strauss & co. is a privately held American clothing company known worldwide for its Levi's brand of denim jeans.  
The company's corporate headquarters is located at Levi's Plaza in San Francisco.

Head sportswear if the last but not the least in the series of licensee rights. Head a ski and snowboard brand who has strong roots in the tennis industry and supports top 10 tennis player and multiple "grand slam" winner Novac Djokovic.
profile_positions.title: Creative Teamlead & Senior graphic designer

profile_positions.description:
- Graphic designs for Men Summer t-shirt collection. 

- All-over (pattern) designs for Woman Summer collection. 

- Style design for various products like jackets, polo-shirts,walk-shorts and board-shorts.

Brunotti is a sports fashion brand established in 1979, manufacturing apparel, surfboards, footwear, bags, eyewear and underwear. Our brand is founded by the Italian Claudio Brunotti. He was a real bon vivant and a talented windsurfer. He started with shaping surfboards. His feeling for style, colour and quality was unique those days. It became the signature of our brand.
profile_positions.title: Graphic designer

profile_positions.description:
I am a passionate designer, always seeking innovative techniques and concepts, but I never loose sight of the possibilities for success and commercial value. 

If you are interested please visit www.cargocollective.com/RVM
profile_positions.title: Graphic designer & Consultant for  various projects in the sportswear apparel & fashion industry

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibility

- Key team member of the graphic design department. 

- Working together, in a team of 25 style designers, on a partly European and Worldwide collection of surf, snowboard and casual wear.
Responsible for a trend right graphic language for men lifestyle and performance and leading in that process. So designing graphics for outerwear, fleeces, t-shirts and other lifestyle products.

- Setting up corporate guidelines concerning logo usage pan-European and Worldwide.

- Collaborate with international designers and professional team riders to create an alignment
between the professional users and commercial products within the collections.

- Numerous collection presentations internal for buying dept, marketing dept, board of directors as well as for a international audience of colleagues from the U.S. Australia and Japan as well as  sales representatives from country’s worldwide during distributor meetings.

- Designing P.O.S. materials for marketing and pr dept, developing sales collection books and overviews within all collections; men, woman, kids, accessories etc.

- Internship supervisor, managing interns and their projects for more than 10+ years all with great results.

- Member of advice committee (guarding O’Neill’s values en company pillars) to the marketing, pr dept and board of directors.

- Proud to have a proven track-record of commercial graphics that turned out to be huge cash-cows
as well as eye catching innovative designs that generated a turnover likewise.

O'Neill is an American surfboard, surf wear and equipment brand started in 1952 in San Francisco, California, which moved down the coast to Santa Cruz by the end of the decade. The company is credited with inventing the wetsuit. Jack O'Neill founded the very first O'Neill company. In 2007, O'Neill Wetsuits Inc. sold the rights to the trademark to Logo International Inc. O'Neill products are distributed internationally by a group of authorized licensed distributors worldwide.
profile_positions.title: Graphic designer

profile_positions.description:
Annual lecture’s at the MA (Media College Amsterdam) this consists out of defining a design task that gave the students a chance to gather study points for their final exam, with 4 presentations from the student, defending and explaining their concepts and designs.
The final presentation of the students always was in a environment not known to them, just to get them out of their comfort zone and to prepare them for their future (presentation) work.

For years in a row these projects are chosen by the students as the project that they learned the most from and was the most valuable to their experience.

This was for classes in their exam (final) year of study, so real important and for me a pleasure to help the students to get to a professional level of understanding, designing, working and to present themselves for future customers.

profile_positions.description: Responsible for art and trend direction of the collections, graphic design, art direction for marketing campaigns and point of sale materials, art direction at photo shoots.
